summary: REQ-15 appears to be implemented by updating Page 2â€™s heading and paragraphs in the centralized content module (frontend/src/content/storyContent.ts). However, two additional non-requested documentation/metadata files were also modified.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified project metadata/state file (project_state.json) including summary/versioning content unrelated to updating Page 2 message text.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to update Page 2 message text in frontend/src/content/storyContent.ts and explicitly listed non-goals like not changing routing/flow/theme; updating project state metadata was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/maintained generated documentation summary file frontend-file-summaries.txt describing multiple components and behaviors.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not request updating repository summary/docs files; it requested only centralized content changes for Page 2.
